msg: The loading of ejb jars can now survive instances where the XML is invalid

author: dblevins
msg: Edited the error messages a bit for when jars aren't loaded.  Hopefully this
will help people see that sometimes their jars aren't loaded!

author: dblevins
msg: Patched the remote server.  It was throwning a null pointer when asked to
create handles outside the scope of one of it's own client requests

author: adc
msg: Should use ejb v1.0 not ejb v2.0.
